Very nice art. However, I have a question. I am unaware of what you use to create art online and the entire process. Can someone enlighten me? Plz. :3 Like what programs.. etc..

First, to draw digitally you need a [Drawing Tablet](https://www.google.com/search?q=electronic+drawing+pad&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8#q=tablet+drawing&tbm=vid). 

Then most people use [PaintToolSai](http://painttool-sai.free-downloads.us.com/?lp=adwords&tg=us&kw=Paint%20tool%20sai&mt=e&ad=62543307318&pl=&ds=s&gclid=CjwKEAiA68WnBRCJxZr5qoaL3iMSJAAXIrr3w2r8fd0hcXPttG9tI-QfzxK6g33c2LQdDTxq2Sp9wxoC1vjw_wcB). But a lot of people still also use Adobe Photoshop. 

Some then choose to combine these two. I believe most who use both draw in Photoshop and color in Sai. (Just don't quote me on that ;p)

Hope this answers your question :)
